snippet.title: Banjo Kazooie Santa's Village
snippet.description:
#BanjoKazooie #christmas #Nintendo64
Santa Claus has been kidnapped by Grunty in his own workshop! Explore Santa's Village and help its inhabitants in different tasks to be able to save Santa, capture Grunty and (one more year) save Christmas!!
Content:
200 Notes
10 Christmas tokens
1 hour of gameplay approx

DOWNLOAD:
Drop your "Banjo-Kazooie (U) [!].z64" rom here https://patch.wedarobi.com/bk_santas_village

Music by Riposte: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6onxGJJ_n_aKYumEU1Wycw/videos

SUPPORT
https://www.patreon.com/Kurko 
https://www.paypal.me/KurkoMods
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/kurko_mods
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Markus_Kurko 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/Kurko_mods/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@kurko_mods

https://youtu.be/kkt5UVne4gY

https://youtu.be/SIZgKilqkQM
